lead_paragraph: Myles Brand, the N.C.A.A. president, was pleased with an overall increase of 1 percentage point in graduation rates for college athletes. For the second consecutive year, the N.C.A.A. released figures showing more than three-quarters of the athletes, 77 percent, graduate within six years, a slight increase over last year’s 76 percent.
